scripts.publish:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run sync-version && npm run build
scripts.publish:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run sync-version && npm run build
scripts.publish:major: npm run version:major && npm run sync-version && npm run build
scripts.sync-version: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); const manifest=require('./public/manifest.json'); manifest.version=pkg.version; require('fs').writeFileSync('public/manifest.json', JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 2))"
scripts.structure: bash -c 'find . -maxdepth 4 \( -name "node_modules" -o -name ".git" -o -name ".next" -o -name ".husky" \) -prune -o -not -name "." -print | sed "s/[^/]*\//|  /g" > structure.txt && echo "Project structure saved to structure.txt"'
